<<<<<<< HEAD
A ioyfull medytacyon to all Englonde of the coronacyon of our moost naturall souerayne lorde kynge Henry the eyght Hawes, Stephen, d. 1523?
[8] p.
In the fletestrete at the sygne of the sonne by Wynkyn de Worde, [Enprynted at London : [1509]]
Author's name appears in colophon. Caption title. Place of publication and printer's name from colophon; publication date from STC. In verse. Signatures: [A]⁴. Imperfect: leaves cropped at foot, with some loss of print. Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
=======
